about_the_game:
Synopsis:

Swimsuit Summer Slam, commonly known as SSS, has been held by the super entertainment company in collaboration with adult video companies for several years. In response to the global trend of declining birth rates, entertainment, and adultification, the competition aims to select male amateurs to challenge the long-standing female athletes in water sports and engage in dramatic physical confrontations to select the strongest and most elite sperm for human reproduction.

Game modes:

In the game, you can choose one of the three opponents to battle against. After winning the battle, you can unlock a practice mode for continuous battles.

A victory in battle can earn you cash, which can be used to purchase upgrades for various skills and attributes at the Talent menu, making the battle much easier.

Gameplay:

The player takes on the role of the male protagonist and challenges three of the strongest female characters.

In the battle, players can control left and right movement by pressing A and D keys.

The opponent will move and prepare for an attack, and there will be a countdown readiness period before the attack. During this readiness period, if the correct judgment can be made, it is possible to dodge the opponent's attack.

After dodging enough attacks, you can counterattack and defeat your opponent.

Combo:

When you successfully dodge your opponents in a row, there will be a combo counter, and the combo can allow the player to earn more cash.

Story Mode:

Defeating the strongest female character will unlock her corresponding story, which includes her exclusive animations and plot in the story mode.

content_descriptors.notes: All characters within the game are over the age of 18, and the game's resources involve a small amount of nudity. There is some sexually explicit content in the text of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: IntelCore i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT640
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: As the only male in the swimsuit Summer Frenzy competition, challenge the strongest three women, the simple confrontation game of postgraduate judgment and reaction!
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
